article_title: Washington group puts up anti-wolf billboards

RICH LANDERS
Spokesman-Review

og.description: SPOKANE – A newly organized anti-wolf group says it's targeting Spokane with a billboard campaign to highlight members' concerns about the increasing number of wolves in Washington state.
